summary: 4 maintainability issues fixed - debug prints removed, PID mechanism removed, async docstring added, and timezone-aware datetime used. Code is cleaner and ready to merge.

round1_verification.title: Debug print statements in production code
round1_verification.verification: Reviewed src/intercom_client.py - all print() statements with [ASYNC], [SEARCH API], [PIPELINE] prefixes have been removed. Code now uses logger.debug/info/warning appropriately.

round1_verification.title: Magic number _MAX_DRY_RUN_PREVIEWS
round1_verification.verification: Pre-existing code, outside PR scope. Comment at line 51-52 now documents memory limit purpose.

round1_verification.title: Hardcoded PID file path
round1_verification.verification: PID file mechanism completely removed. Pipeline now uses in-memory _active_runs dict (line 43) for tracking active runs.

round1_verification.title: Missing docstring on async retry method
round1_verification.expected_fix: Copy full docstring from sync version
round1_verification.verification: Full docstring added at lines 173-191 with Args, Returns, Raises sections matching sync counterpart style.

round1_verification.title: Duplicated retry logic between sync/async
round1_verification.verification: Acceptable duplication - async/sync patterns inherently differ. Relationship is now documented via matching docstrings.

round1_verification.title: Unclear variable name _ALLOWED_PHASE_FIELDS
round1_verification.verification: Pre-existing code, outside PR scope. Name is acceptable with context.

round1_verification.title: Deprecated datetime.utcnow() usage
round1_verification.verification: Line 344 in fetch_quality_conversations_async now uses datetime.now(timezone.utc). The instance at line 787 in fetch_recent_conversations is pre-existing code not touched by this PR.
